import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux' import { productDetailsAction } from '../actions/productsAction' import { Row,Col,Button,Image,ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import Ratings from './Ratings' const ProductDetails = ({match}) => { const dispatch=useDispatch() const productDetails=useSelector(state=>state.productDetails) const {loading,errror,product}=productDetails useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(productDetailsAction(match.params.id)) },[match,dispatch]) return (

{product.title}

 {product.description} Price: {product.price} $ Status: {product.countInStock} In Stock
) } export default ProductDetails
